# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-services-drivermanager-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-services/driver-mgr/drivermanager-service-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/drivermanager-service-deployment-1.1.0-20170103.053711-5.zip" && unzip -q -o -B common-services-drivermanager-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f common-services-drivermanager-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8103
RUN echo Open-O common-services-drivermanager 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-services/driver-mgr/drivermanager-service-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/drivermanager-service-deployment-1.1.0-20170103.053711-5.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
